description: Native library or method not found. Occurs when JNI/NDK libraries fail to load or specific native methods missing.
commonCauses: Native library (.so) not included for device ABI
Library not in correct APK directory
solutions: Include native libraries for all target ABIs
Verify library name matches System.loadLibrary() call
Check native method signatures match exactly
Build libraries for all required architectures
Use abiFilters to specify supported ABIs
Verify .so files are in lib/<abi>/ in APK
prevention: Build native libraries for all common ABIs (arm64-v8a, armeabi-v7a, x86_64)
Test on devices with different architectures
Use CMake or ndk-build for consistent builds
Use App Bundle to optimize ABI delivery
examples: external fun nativeMethod(): String // Must match JNI implementation
